name: deimosrising
text: Is this a thing people actually do to cats? That is weird.

name: tehvirus
text: Showing cats, yes. Sticking matches up their butts to help them make doodie, I sure hope not.

name: reverendsam
text: it is called "expressing your cat" and it happens sometimes

name: greenkoolayd
text: expressing a cat isnt about poop, though.  they have a little gland right below the tail, in that general area.  if you let the goo build up, it can get irritated/infected.

name: heccibiggs
text: thanks i completely didn't need to know this

name: catachresis
text: This is a Schrodinger strip. It is simultaneously incredibly awesome and stupidly terrible.

name: petro
text: A comment left by petro was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fancypants, dinner, clembot, SotiCoto)

name: badganjil
text: A comment left by badganjil was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, O0o, tasteful, 7th_shot, ConnorMc, clembot)

name: snowman
text: Man, you understood the FUCK out of that reference.

name: tasteful
text: i wish i had you on my shoulder to call out my foes when i was too slow

name: peng33
text: I don't even understand why, but this is probably my favorite achewood comment.. ever.

name: nabeel84
text: A comment left by nabeel84 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ohmygooses, crawfomp, clembot, anitrophaeron)

name: juancarlos
text: It made the doodie come out of Ray, CAN'T YOU SEE THAT? I've always had problems with the talking stuffed animals aspect, oddly Ray being a proud feline never bothered me.

name: zombieman
text: This one has always stayed with me.

name: kledermans
text: It clearly stayed with Ray as well.

name: tekende
text: Clearly it didn't; it stayed on the ground.

name: bixschmix
text: EVERY TIME

name: antsama
text: A comment left by antsama was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, Thorfinn, GSurge, chivalress, BillyLK)

name: philosophe
text: yelled batman

name: heccibiggs
text: Hahaha every time I think of this it is just as hilarious as the first.

name: catgrl131
text: exclaimed Phillipe

name: ravindra108
text: purred catgrl

name: falala
text: raved ravindra

name: atlanticcity
text: said falala before retreating into her turtleneck in shame

name: aargh
text: My god... when will it end?!?!?!?!

name: glorify
text: asked blurry Toothpaste for Dinner

name: ajesteronly
text:
Stated eyeliner-wearing Roast Beeee-

SPOGHTGHT!

Fuck man! I barfed! I barfed because you looked in my eyes!

SPUFGH

name: sabbac
text: Slowly vomited Ray, reaching for a martini

name: ajesteronly
text: Actually, this is Ray demonstrating how he got his bone on six times.

name: theguitarhero
text:
He was all

DEMONSTRATE DEMONSTRATE DEMONSTRATE DEMONSTRATE DEMONSTRATE DEMONSTRATE.

name: pants
text: ray seems very traumatized by this particular memory. having a match stuffed up your bum can have that effect.

name: ssddr
text: He freaks out so bad that his vocabulary turns into noting, its so great.

name: geysershitdick
text: horrifying

name: fuckyoufriday
text: The one and only mention of this. Weird.

name: acefalco
text: Sometimes, one of your buds will tell you something you didn't need to know, but that they needed to tell. After, you move on.

name: cicadalek
text: The last panel...such energy

name: rad_chillies
text: I love how random and dumb this strip is.  Totally out of character, Ray's just acting weird.  Absurdity makes me giggle for SURE.  This is my kind of humor.

name: gumfish
text: Well this was out of left field.

name: flim
text: A comment left by flim was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by divot, littlecat, SotiCoto)

name: woodenteeth
text: Does anyone remember that these dudes live in a weird underground world anymore?

name: gussiejives
text: The last panel makes me crack up every time.

name: honesttom
text: The ground, dammit! On to the GROUND!

name: caseyb3
text:
Ray is basically expressing terror at something that happened so long ago everyone except him involved could be dead.

Onto the ground!

name: professorhazard
text: That's not the only thing he was expressing.

name: satellitetv
text: Shit I just laughed at this. . . again. For, like, the 5th time. I'm just hitting random comic and that last frame. . . man. . .

name: maximus
text: what truly can be more humorous than someone fervently recounting his bouts with constipation?

name: heccibiggs
text: Your avatar is just barely animated.

name: scriblerus
text: The alt text is what makes this one, for me.

name: rhadamanthus
text: Me too, but I'm not able to figure if he means it in the sense of the strip or of life in general. I prefer the latter.

name: professorhazard
text: Onstad always means both.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
another one that made me laugh out loud

awesome

name: lawbot
text: Ray has a past.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
At first, I thought the odd thing about this strip was that the doodie-makin' was the first thing that Ray thought of when remembering the Colonel (and being so public about it). But if somebody stuck a match up my ass, that'd probably be the primary memory for me, as well.

Sometimes memories are better left repressed.

name: hendetta
text: I just don't understand how Ray came to be owned at any period. Maybe he needed the flow.

name: libelandslander
text:
Well uh seeing as he said breeder I was kind of thinking that was where he was born...
Unless there is evidence to the contrary?

name: littlefatdog
text: Ray is a cat

name: honeyspider
text: A comment left by honeyspider was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Thorfinn, gussiejives, foetus_punch)

name: andyboy
text: Ray has his own set of circumstances.

name: red-barchetta
text: Teodor is completely taken aback by Rays loss of composure. The last panel gets this one a 5.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I can't tell if Ray was traumatized or not, but it certainly appears that way.

name: deusoma
text: As someone nicknamed JJ, the third panel makes me feel strange.

name: jakkthestripper
text: I like the correlation between this and the arc about Ray's old southern uncle. Really shows the depth of Ray's character.

name: genequagmire
text:
I lol'ed so hard at the last page. I could actually imagine Ray's insistent tone.

5 , would laugh at again.

name: jar
text: Ray always seemed to me to be more completely amazed than he is horrified by this.

name: aseidel
text:
do all these characters have a troubled past?
maybe he should go stick his arm in the toilet repetatively.

name: freakscene
text: I'm fucking terrified.

name: carlyle
text: Right FUCKIN' there on the ground, man.

name: redheron
text:
ONTO THE GROUND

as opposed to the litter box where you are SUPPOSED to make doodie

I can see how this is so traumatic.

name: dardf
text: Ray's panicked look gets me everytime.
